com.nxp.id.jcopx
Class NFCModem

java.lang.Object
  com.nxp.id.jcopx.NFCModem

public class NFCModem
extends java.lang.Object

NFCModem provides an API to the JCOP proprietary NFC modem functionality

Method Detail

exchange

public static short exchange(byte command,
                             byte[] transmitBuff,
                             short transmitOffset,
                             short transmitLength,
                             byte[] receiveBuff,
                             short receiveOffset,
                             short receiveLength)
Writes transmitLength bytes to device specified by address command Reads one byte from device specified by address command into the buffer receiveBuff at offset receiveOffset.

Parameters:
command - the address of target NFC device register connected to the bus. The address is one byte long. The LSB is R/W selector. The other 7 bits are the actual address of the device.
transmitBuff - a byte array containing the data to be written to the NFC device.
transmitOffset - the start offset from the above array.
transmitLength - number of bytes to be written to the NFC device.
receiveBuff - a byte array where the read data from the NFC device is written to.
receiveOffset - the start offset from the above array.
receiveLength - number of bytes to be read from the NFC device.
Returns:
short
Throws:
APDUException - with following reason codes:
  • BUFFER_BOUNDS if start condition fails(busy)
  • BAD_LENGTH in case of no ACK on slave-address by writing a the address to the bus
  • IO_ERROR in case of no ACK on data byte while attempting to write a data byte to the device
SystemException - with following reason code:
  • NO_RESOURCE_VAL in case JCOP OS doesn't provide NFC Modem functionality
